data.text: O! Yehowa,
O! Nye Mawu, ŋuwòe meɖo dzi ɖo.
Ame si tsɔ eƒe mɔkpɔkpɔ da ɖe dziwò la,
O! Yehowa, fia wò mɔwo
kplɔm le wò nyateƒe la me, eye nàfia num,
O! Yehowa, ɖo ŋku wò lɔlɔ̃
O! Yehowa, mègaɖo ŋku nye ɖekakpuimenu vɔ̃wo
Yehowa nyo, eye wòwɔa nu dzɔdzɔe,
Ekplɔa ɖokuibɔbɔlawo to nu dzɔdzɔe wɔwɔ me,
Yehowa ƒe mɔwo katã nye lɔlɔ̃ kple nuteƒewɔwɔ na
O! Yehowa, togbɔ be nye dzidada sɔ gbɔ ale gbegbe hã la,
Ekema ame kawoe nye ŋutsu ma siwo vɔ̃a Yehowa?
Woakpɔ dzidzedze le woƒe agbemeŋkekewo me,
Yehowa gblɔa nya ɣaɣlawo na ame siwo vɔ̃nɛ,
Nye ŋkuwo le Yehowa ŋu ɖaa,
Trɔ ɖe ŋunye ne nàve nunye,
Nye dzi ƒe nuxaxawo do gã ɖe edzi,
Nye kɔ nàkpɔ nye nuxaxa kple nye vevesese ɖa,
Kpɔ ale si nye futɔwo dzi ɖe edzii ɖa,
Kpɔ nye agbe ta, eye nàɖem;
Nuteƒewɔwɔ kple dzɔdzɔenyenye nedzɔ ŋunye,
O! Mawu,
